snippet.title: PickCrafter - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Mine gems, collect pickaxes, and discover treasure filled worlds in PickCrafter! 
Google Play: https://goo.gl/S83fLJ
Apple App Store: https://goo.gl/ow53WN

PickCrafter is an addictive Minecraft inspired adventure game. Tap or swing to break blocks and collect picks. Use your picks to open chests loaded with treasure. Unlock many collectibles. Explore different biomes and see if you can reach them all. Can you collect all of the pickaxes and score to the top of the leaderboards?

Download now to unleash your inner treasure hunter in PickCrafter! 

----------------

= FEATURES =
• Break blocks and earn picks to craft treasures
• Unlock and upgrade epic pickaxes
• Use abilities to boost your strength
• Heat up and catch on fire!
• Discover and explore unique biomes
• Prestige to reach new heights
• Compete with your friends and rank up on the leaderboard
• Over 50 achievements to unlock!

----------------

LIKE PICKCRAFTER ON FACEBOOK!
https://www.facebook.com/pickcraftergame

FOLLOW PICKCRAFTER ON TWITTER!
http://www.twitter.com/pickcraftergame

JOIN THE COMMUNITY ON DISCORD!
https://discord.gg/pickcrafter

----------------

Note: PickCrafter is free to play and all items can be obtained through standard gameplay, however the option to purchase content using real money exists.

----------------

Music by Tobu - Hope [NCS Release]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EP625xQIGzs

Follow Tobu:
http://www.7obu.com
http://www.soundcloud.com/7obu
http://www.facebook.com/tobuofficial
http://www.twitter.com/tobuofficial
http://www.youtube.com/tobuofficial
